channel.title: I need help with i pod =(
channel.description: How do I put music in the the ipod using itunes. i got everything the wire, itunes, limewire but idk how to put the music. and also how do i put music on ipod from limewire too.

item.title: I need help with i pod =(
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Boot Itunes up
click File
Click add foler to library
Browse for you music folder and add it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with i pod =(
